column2: portions were really good except for the mac & cheese which was kind of small but very tasty. Our only complaint was that the meals didn't come with any kind of bread. But we love the fact that you got two different types of barbecue sauce to try (we both agreed we liked the Memphis style). It's also a small dining area so it can get really crowded really quickly and you have to be comfortable sitting very close to other people. But all in all we would go back for sure.
